list_definition.definition: the raising of a person to a higher rank or position

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has just been given (a) promotion.

list_definition.definition: the activity of advertising a product etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is against the promotion of cigarettes.
